named-query.name: BC_READ_DEFAULT_CURRENCY
named-query.query: SELECT currency FROM org.broadleafcommerce.common.currency.domain.BroadleafCurrency currency WHERE currency.defaultFlag = true

named-query.name: BC_READ_CURRENCY_BY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT currency FROM org.broadleafcommerce.common.currency.domain.BroadleafCurrency currency WHERE currency.currencyCode = :currencyCode
